task.title: Install Livefyre for AEM 6.1 or AEM 6.2
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to Install Livefyre for AEM 6.1 or 6.2 without AEM Assets.

context.p: For more information on downloading and installing AEM packages, see Downloading and Installing Packages from Package Share on docs.adobe.com.
To install the Livefyre for AEM package for 6.1 or 6.2:

step.cmd: Click on one of the following Communities Packages that contain the Livefyre package and automatically install Livefyre in AEM:

ul.li: If using AEM 6.2, install the latest AEM 6.2 Communities feature pack
If using AEM 6.1, install the latest AEM 6.1 Communities feature pack
Note: You do not need to have a communities license to use AEM with Livefyre. You must have a Livefyre license to use AEM with Livefyre.

step.cmd: Download the feature pack into Package Manager. Livefyre automatically installs when you install Communities. To check that Livefyre is active, you can view the bundle in the system console. For more information on how to view the bundle in the system console, see Web Console on docs.adobe.com.
Replicate the package to your Publish instance by clicking More > Replicate.
